1.0.1.name: wordpress/vidlinkr
1.0.1.description:
Vidlinkr fuses content with ecommerce by adding a ‘Vidlink’ - a clickable buy button for a relevant product - to each video on your site. It scans your WordPress site for videos and shows you them in a user-friendly dashboard, from which you can quickly and easily manage which Vidlinks are added.

With a straightforward installation process, a simple interface for managing your videos and the potential to generate unlimited revenue, Vidlinkr is the easy way to make money from videos!

Features

  • Easy to install - With a one-page sign up for a Vidlinkr account and an easy three-step WordPress installation you’ll be up and running in minutes.
  • Easy to maintain - Vidlinkr’s simple user interface shows you all the videos on your site and lets you choose the product for each Vidlink. If you prefer a ‘hands-off’ approach you can let our automated system manage each Vidlink. You have complete control.
  • Seamless
